snippet.title: Kojum: Combat Ball - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Kojum: Combat Ball is a football and martial arts mashup. Use your moves to score the perfect goal, and if your opponents get in the way, beat them down.

Available on itch.io: https://heartfiregames.itch.io/kojum

-----

Website: https://www.heartfire.games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HeartfireGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heartfiregames
